item.title: Extracting features from text - BoW, tfidf
item.description: Extracting features from text Bag-of-words TF-IDF Term-frequency-inverse document frequency Numeriacal statistics to reflect how important a word is to a document Used as weighting factor in text mining, it can also be used to generate word vector/ matrix representation Increase proportionally to the number of times a word appears in the document offset by the frequency of the word in the corpus $$ tfidf(t,d,D) = tf(t,d) * idf(t,D) $$
